channel.title: Scar Runescape Scripts Rules | No requests in this section!
channel.description:
[ul][*]NO REQUESTS IN THIS SECTION! This is solely a place to post RS2 Scripts [*]All Scripts Posted must be posted with permission of the current owner [*]There must be a direct link to the script within the post, or it must be attached. [*]Name your threads properly, so we know straight away what will be in the thread. 'Awsome Scripts here!' do not help us [*]Tag your threads please with [RS2], [SS], [Priv Server] etc. It will help us a lot [*]You may [b]not[/b] Sell scripts here - Check SCAR Script sales board for that[/ul]
[br] Rules can be added or changed at anytime
Thanks!

item.title: Scar Runescape Scripts Rules | No requests in this section!
item.dc:creator: @Violentypro Violentypro
item.description:
@Violentypro wrote:

I had little time on my hands, so i just wrote something in a hurry, witch i knew wouldn’t work.

This is not a lang witch is not meant to do this. Only reason why i wrote it in that lang in the first place is because i was already writing a script in it, and i dont remember much from scar, c ++ and all those language’s that i used to know…

this code would work if there was such events, and i have no intension to create the events needed to do the following things.

[code]
[table][tr][td]
event load
{
es_setinfo user_posts 0
es_setinfo file_path “” // Whatever the file path would be
}

event player_post // these are imaginitive events, since cs:s haven’t got
// such events
{
server_var(user_posts) ++
}

block player_userpost_under_10
{
if(server_var(user_post) <= 10) do
{
es_menu 0 (userid) “An Error Has Occurred!\n You are not allowed to access this section” 0
}
else do
{
// command to popup a window with
// the file_path.
// since this cant be done in cs:s, I cant create it,
//unless i start using a lot of python, wich i dont know.
}
}

event player_open_file
{
es_doblock filename_of_this_script/player_userpost_under_10
}

[/table][/code]

Edit: btw it was a suggestion that the person might needed to have the user post of 5 or more (or w/e number you want)

Read full topic
item.source: Scar Runescape Scripts Rules | No requests in this section!

item.title: Scar Runescape Scripts Rules | No requests in this section!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“Violentypro, post:20, topic:387”]I think it has got something to do with people not just coming here to download scripts, therefor they have set some request to be made before you can download (eg

i = userpost

if(i < 10) then
{
send(http:// link to not allowed or w/e)
}

)

btw im not scripting in java there, and i dont know what the open new link thing is for that lang :P[/quote]

please, leave with what little dignity you have left.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Lorax, post:14, topic:387”][quote author=Ron link=topic=148.msg86636#msg86636 date=1153777231]
Wait we can’t put scripts in code tags? We have to attach them if it is ours?
[/quote]
I think it makes mopars server laag to much?[/quote]
HA!

Scar has nothing to do with private severs. unless you uses them on psevers instead of runescape.

item.title: Scar Runescape Scripts Rules | No requests in this section!
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“addy_princess, post:9, topic:387”]whoa what is scar? [br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 03:18:43 AM[/size][hr][quote author=deadlycow21 link=topic=148.msg2221#msg2221 date=1141692709]
cool… i will make sure to add tags to messages now.
[/quote]
If you jump out of an ugly tree don’t hit branches on the way down :D[/quote]
SCAR is a scripting language people use to create bots/games/autoclickers ect.
Type in google and search for “Download SCAR” and then download it
May people on this community provide scipts so you could use them as bases to get you scripting language started
